exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros c l x x'. unfold max_id_for_client_default. induction l as [| e l' IHl]. - reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (clientId_eq_dec c (eClient e)) as [Heq | Hneq]. + rewrite Heq. rewrite Nat.max_comm. rewrite <- Nat.max_assoc. apply Nat.max_compat. * apply Nat.max_le_iff. right. apply Nat.max_le_iff in IHl. destruct IHl. -- apply Nat.le_max_l. -- apply Nat.le_max_r. * reflexivity. + rewrite Hneq. apply IHl. intros e' Hin Heq'. apply (max_id_for_client_default_le l' x c). * auto. * auto.
